column1: The Pit Room////As for the food
column2: the prices are a little high in my opinion - note that their online menu is not up-to-date
column3: and they would not honor it. Specifically
column4: meals do not come with chips (i.e. not 3rd side for substitution of chips). As for the meat
column6: which was definitely moist and well-seasoned but way too moist because it's soaking in a pool of juices and a bucket of grease. I can see why many people like their pulled pork
column7: but it just wasn't for me.
